statement: No FY‑2026 compliance determinations or enforcement actions by the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) affecting Arkansas were identified.  CMS’s 2025 approval letter for Arkansas’s section 1115 demonstration and related federal guidance documents contain program requirements but do not constitute enforcement actions or compliance determinations for FY‑2026.
statutory_basis:
The CMS approval letter for the Arkansas section 1115 demonstration outlines program conditions and expectations but
does not impose enforcement actions【29633513042789†L1460-L1494】.
